#Text=Ozai says : " Iroh is a traitor , and your brother Zuko is a failure .

#Text= Main Aang Appa Arnook Katara Iroh La Momo Pakku Sokka Tui Yue says : " Antagonists Fire Nation soldiers Koh Zhao Zuko Minor Azula Baboon spirit Hahn Hei Bai Ozai Roku Water Tribe warriors " Katara says : " Water .

column1: #Text=Earth .
#Text=Fire .
#Text=Air .
#Text=Long ago , the four nations lived together in harmony .
#Text=Then , everything changed when the Fire Nation attacked .
#Text=Only the Avatar , master of all four elements , could stop them , but when the world needed him most , he vanished .
#Text=A hundred years passed , and my brother and I discovered the new Avatar , an airbender named Aang .
#Text=And although his airbending skills are great , he has a lot to learn before he 's ready to save anyone .
#Text=But I believe Aang can save the world .
#Text=" Village kids says : " Yay !
#Text=Aang 's back !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I knew it !
#Text=You signaled the Fire Navy with that flare !
#Text=You 're leading them straight to us , are n't you ?
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang did n't do anything !
#Text=It was an accident .
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah .
#Text=We were on the ship and there was this booby trap , and , well -- -- we booby - ed right into it .
#Text=" Kanna says : " Katara , you should n't have gone on that ship !
#Text=Now we could all be in danger !
#Text=" Aang says : " Do n't blame Katara .
#Text=I brought her there .
#Text=It 's my fault .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aha !
#Text=The traitor confesses !
#Text=Warriors , away from the enemy .
#Text=The foreigner is banished from our village .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka , you 're making a mistake .
#Text=" Sokka says : " No , I 'm keeping my promise to Dad .
#Text=I 'm protecting you , from threats like him !
#Text=" Katara says : " Aang is not our enemy !
#Text=Do n't you see ?
#Text=Aang 's brought us something we have n't had in a long time : fun .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Fun ?!
#Text=We ca n't fight firebenders with fun !
#Text=" Aang says : " You should try it sometime .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Get out of our village !
#Text=Now !
#Text=" Katara says : " Grandmother , please .
#Text=Do n't let Sokka do this !
#Text=" Kanna says : " Katara , you knew going on that ship was forbidden .
#Text=Sokka is right .
#Text=I think it best if the airbender leaves .
#Text=" Katara says : " Fine !
#Text=Then I 'm banished , too !
#Text=Come on Aang , let 's go .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Where do you think you 're going ?
#Text=" Katara says : " To find a waterbender .
#Text=Aang is taking me to the North Pole .
#Text=" Aang says : " I am ?
#Text=Great !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Katara !
#Text=Would you really choose him over your tribe ?
#Text=Your own family ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Katara , I do n't want to come between you and your family .
#Text=" Katara says : " So , you 're leaving the South Pole ?
#Text=This is goodbye ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Thanks for penguin sledding with me .
#Text=" Katara says : " Where will you go ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Guess I 'll go back home and look for the airbenders .
#Text=Wow , I have n't cleaned my room in a hundred years .
#Text=Not looking forward to that .
#Text=It was nice meeting everyone .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Let 's see your bison fly now , air boy .
#Text=" Aang says : " Come on Appa , you can do it .
#Text=Yip - yip !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , I thought so !
#Text=" Southern Water Tribe girl says : " Ahhh !
#Text=Aang , do n't go !
#Text=I 'll miss you !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'll miss you , too .
#Text=Come on , boy .
#Text=" Kanna says : " Katara , you 'll feel better after you - " Katara says : " You happy now ?
#Text=There goes my one chance at becoming a waterbender !
#Text=" Sokka says : " All right , ready our defenses !
#Text=The Fire Nation could be on our shores any moment now !
#Text=" Southern Water Tribe boy says : " But I got ta ... " Sokka says : " And no potty breaks !
#Text="
